name: NumPy
description: NumPy (Numerical Python) is the cornerstone library for numerical and scientific computing in Python. It provides support for large, multi-dimensional arrays and matrices, along with a vast collection of high-level mathematical functions to operate on these arrays efficiently.

name: Pandas
description: Pandas: Built on top of NumPy, Pandas offers high-performance, easy-to-use data structures (like DataFrames) and data analysis tools. It's essential for data cleaning, manipulation, merging, reshaping, and analysis.

name: Python
description: A popular programming language used in data science

name: Keras
description: used as part of machine learning
